name: Dog walking simulator
description:
Hello, are you ready to start a dog empire, me too! When you launch the game you have 2 options, pet the dog, or walk the dog, walking gives you money, petting walks quicker, then upgrade, repeat. First game jam and 3d game ever(about) thank you to eric guadara for helping me i might have made the game too hard...

DISCLIAMER, dimensions got screwed up and I don't know how to fix them, most of the upgrades and extra walker might go off screen, sorry
